title: Folding Stool, "One__Shot.MGX", 2006
dimensions:
H x diam. (open): 39.7 x 32.1 cm (15 5/8 x 12 5/8 in.)
L x diam. (closed): 66 x 10.5 cm (26 x 4 1/8 in.)
creditline: The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection
description: White form of moveable folding elements. Closed position: tight cylinder of 12 legs each hinged at joint with seat element, in turn hinged at top to small circle with inset handle. Form furls out into circular seat composed of 12 wedges spiraling out from central circle with handle; each wedge with hinged leg twisting down into a central shaft, then flairing out to form stable, 12-footed base. Nylon surfaces shows lines and marks of layering from laser syntering process.
